txt.en: The Grim has been vanquished and Raven Hill is secure
The caves have filled with noxious smoke
The Easterlings have constructed a vile machine to fill the tunnels and caves of the Lonely Mountain with deadly noxious smoke and fumes.
The grim has exploded and filled the caverns
Do not allow the caves to fill with smoke
The Grim has been defeated and Raven Hill is safe
Defeat the Grim and break the siege of Raven Hill
The Tunnels have been filled with smoke
The Easterlings have constructed a vile machine to fill the tunnels and caves of the Lonely Mountain with deadly noxious smoke and fumes.
The Easterlings have constructed a vile machine to fill the tunnels and caves of the Lonely Mountain with deadly noxious smoke and fumes.
Approach the Grim and begin the battle.
Defeat the Grim fueling the Easterlings furnace before it explodes
Do not allow too much smoke to fill the caves
